rag_input_context_pack_compact.strategy_question: Find in the documents rules and guidance to write a general overview of this video's art direction.
rag_input_context_pack_compact.core_summary: This film depicts Jesus Christ arriving in present-day Paris, witnessing the city as it is now. He observes the contemporary world with a disillusioned gaze, yet the story unfolds with his powers. It's a two-hour film filled with nostalgia, featuring a bitter and somewhat melancholic humor.

passes.name: focused
passes.query_text: Find in the documents rules and guidance to write a general overview of this video's art direction. | target_path=n0.art_direction | writing_typology=style | Focus on visual direction: palette, lighting, contrast, texture, framing, camera movement, and coherent aesthetic identity.
passes.task_prompt:
You are an expert narratology research agent working on retrieval, not final writing.
Pass: focused.
Target path (internal id): n0.art_direction
Target objective (human): n0 art direction
Writing typology: style.
Goal: retrieve diverse, high-signal evidence from allowed files only.
Process: (1) identify relevant principles, (2) capture concrete method statements, (3) avoid generic plot summaries.
ALLOWED source_file values (EXACT STRING MATCH, case-sensitive):
  - SRC_DA__chatGPT.txt
STRICT VALIDATION:
- source_file MUST be one of the allowed values above.
- NEVER use internal ids (e.g. n0.narrative_presentation) as source_file.
- Any item with invalid source_file will be discarded.
- excerpt MUST be an exact contiguous quote copied from the source text (verbatim only).
- NEVER paraphrase, compress, translate, or rewrite excerpts.
- If you cannot provide an exact quote, skip the item.
Return ONLY valid JSON with this schema:
{ "items": [ { "source_file": "", "summary": "", "key_concepts": [], "excerpt": "" } ] }
- Provide at most 30 items.
- Excerpts must be verbatim, each under 1400 characters.
- Summaries must be 1-2 sentences and actionable for writing strategy.
- Prefer diversity across distinct sections of source content.
CONTEXT_POLICY:
- Treat CONTEXT_OBJECT as project context, not as mandatory output wording.
- Prioritize visual design principles (palette, lighting, textures, framing, movement).
- Avoid plot retelling; retrieve aesthetic and stylistic guidance.
CONTEXT_OBJECT:
brief_video_type: film
brief_target_duration_s: 7200
core_summary: This film depicts Jesus Christ arriving in present-day Paris, witnessing the city as it is now. He observes the contemporary world with a disillusioned gaze, yet the story unfolds with his powers. It's a two-hour film filled with nostalgia, featuring a bitter and somewhat melancholic humor.
- If unsure, return an empty items list.

passes.name: exploratory
passes.query_text:
Find in the documents rules and guidance to write a general overview of this video's art direction. | target_path=n0.art_direction | writing_typology=style | Focus on visual direction: palette, lighting, contrast, texture, framing, camera movement, and coherent aesthetic identity.
EXPLORATORY_RETRIEVAL_GOAL:
- Find complementary principles for target 'n0.art_direction'.
- Include alternatives and edge-case guidance, not only obvious matches.
- Prefer evidence that can become concrete writing instructions.
- Focus on visual direction: palette, lighting, contrast, texture, framing, camera movement, and coherent aesthetic identity.
CONTEXT_USAGE:
- Use context only to adapt examples and constraints; avoid copying user phrasing.
- Story context (object-level): brief_video_type: film
brief_target_duration_s: 7200
core_summary: This film depicts Jesus Christ arriving in present-day Paris, witnessing the city as it is now. He observes the contemporary world with a disillusioned gaze, yet the story unfolds with his powers. It's a two-hour film filled with nostalgia, featuring a bitter and somewhat melancholic humor.

rag_response_debug.raw_agent_message: { "items": [ { "source_file": "SRC_DA__chatGPT.txt", "summary": "The art direction should focus on creating a coherent visual identity that translates the narrative into a structured visual system, emphasizing the importance of materials, textures, and their sociological coherence.", "key_concepts": ["visual identity", "materials", "textures", "sociological coherence"], "excerpt": "Un monde visuel n’existe pas par ses formes seules, mais par ses surfaces. Le look development intègre donc : • des matières dominantes (bois, métal, textile, béton, plastique), • leur état (neuf, usé, réparé, dégradé), • leur cohérence sociologique." }, { "source_file": "SRC_DA__chatGPT.txt", "summary": "A successful lookbook serves as a foundational document for art direction, outlining visual intentions and functional color palettes that guide the overall aesthetic without detailing every scene.", "key_concepts": ["lookbook", "visual intentions", "functional palettes"], "excerpt": "Le lookbook est le premier document structurant de la direction artistique. Contenu typique (mais jamais figé) • intention générale (texte court, clair, non lyrique), • axes visuels majeurs, • palettes chromatiques (pas décoratives, mais fonctionnelles)." }, { "source_file": "SRC_DA__chatGPT.txt", "summary": "Art direction should consider the emotional reading of shots, influenced by the construction of sets, lighting, and the physical relationship between characters and their environments.", "key_concepts": ["emotional reading", "set construction", "lighting"], "excerpt": "Ces décisions influencent directement : •

Contenu typique (mais jamais figé) • intention générale (texte court, clair, non lyrique), • axes visuels majeurs, • palettes chromatiques (pas décoratives, mais fonctionnelles)." }, { "source_file": "SRC_DA__chatGPT.txt", "summary": "Art direction should consider the emotional reading of shots, influenced by the construction of sets, lighting, and the physical relationship between characters and their environments.", "key_concepts": ["emotional reading", "set construction", "lighting"], "excerpt": "Ces décisions influencent directement : •

per_variant.question: Find in the documents rules and guidance to write a general overview of this video's art direction.

source_refs: Concevoir la direction artistique - ChatGPT (notes): The art direction should focus on creating a coherent visual identity that translates the narrative into a structured visual system, emphasizing the importance of materials, textures, and their sociological coherence. | Concepts: visual identity, materials, textures, sociological coherence

Concevoir la direction artistique - ChatGPT (notes): A successful lookbook serves as a foundational document for art direction, outlining visual intentions and functional color palettes that guide the overall aesthetic without detailing every scene. | Concepts: lookbook, visual intentions, functional palettes

Concevoir la direction artistique - ChatGPT (notes): Art direction should consider the emotional reading of shots, influenced by the construction of sets, lighting, and the physical relationship between characters and their environments. | Concepts: emotional reading, set construction, lighting

Concevoir la direction artistique - ChatGPT (notes): The relationship between characters and their environments is crucial; art direction must anticipate how spaces can amplify or diminish a character's presence within the frame. | Concepts: character presence, environment relationship, frame

Concevoir la direction artistique - ChatGPT (notes): Color should be viewed as a structural element that evolves throughout the film, ensuring continuity and emotional coherence across scenes. | Concepts: color structure, continuity, emotional coherence
